member.name: M:PandaScoreNET.LoL.QueryOptions.QueryConfiguration.GetQueryString
member.summary: Gets the query string portion of a request.
member.returns: Query string, formatted as required by the PandaScore API.

member.name: M:PandaScoreNET.LoL.QueryOption`1.Filter(`0)
member.summary: Sets the query to return items that match this value exactly.
member.param: Value of the filter.
member.exception: Thrown when the property cannot be used to filter results or when the supplied value is null.

member.name: M:PandaScoreNET.LoL.QueryOption`1.Range(`0,`0)
member.summary: Sets the query to return items that fall within this range.
member.param: Lower bound of the range.
Upper bound of the range.
member.exception: Thrown when the property cannot be used to filter results or when one or both of the supplied values is null.

member.name: M:PandaScoreNET.LoL.QueryOption`1.Sort
member.summary: Sorts results by this property in ascending order. The ordering of sort options is important!
member.exception: Thrown when the property cannot be used to sort results.

member.name: M:PandaScoreNET.LoL.QueryOption`1.SortDescending
member.summary: Sorts results by this property in descending order. The ordering of sort options is important!
member.exception: Thrown when the property cannot be used to sort results.

member.name: M:PandaScoreNET.LoL.QueryOption`1.Search(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the query to search items that contain this value. Can only be used with string values.
member.param: Search term.
member.exception: Thrown when the property cannot be used to filter results or when the supplied value is null.

member.name: M:PandaScoreNET.LoL.QueryOption`1.UnsetFilter
member.summary: Removes any filters applied to this property.

member.name: M:PandaScoreNET.LoL.QueryOption`1.UnsetSearch
member.summary: Removes any search terms applied to this property.

member.name: M:PandaScoreNET.LoL.QueryOption`1.UnsetRange
member.summary: Removes any range values applied to this property.

member.name: M:PandaScoreNET.LoL.QueryOption`1.UnsetSort
member.summary: Removes any sorting options applied to this property.

member.name: T:PandaScoreNET.PandaScoreLoLProvider
member.summary: The main entry point into the API. Use to make requests from PandaScore.

member.name: P:PandaScoreNET.PandaScoreLoLProvider.RateLimitRemaining
member.summary: How many more queries are remaining for today.

member.name: M:PandaScoreNET.PandaScoreLoLProvider.#ctor(System.String)
member.param: Your PandaScore Access Token.

member.name: M:PandaScoreNET.PandaScoreLoLProvider.GetPlayer(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a player based on its numeric ID.
member.param: A numeric ID belonging to an player.
member.returns: A Player object with the specified ID.
member.exception: Thrown when the request is not successful.

member.name: M:PandaScoreNET.PandaScoreLoLProvider.GetPlayerAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a player based on its numeric ID.
member.param: A numeric ID belonging to an player.
member.returns: A Player object with the specified ID.
member.exception: Thrown when the request is not successful.

member.name: M:PandaScoreNET.PandaScoreLoLProvider.GetSinglePlayer(PandaScoreNET.LoL.PlayerQueryOptions)
member.summary: Gets the first player that matches the query options. Even if there is more than one matching result, only the first will be returned!
member.param: Query options object configured with the query settings.
member.returns: A single Player object, matching the search options, or null, if no matches are found.
member.exception: Thrown when the request is not successful.

member.name: M:PandaScoreNET.PandaScoreLoLProvider.GetSinglePlayerAsync(PandaScoreNET.LoL.PlayerQueryOptions)
member.summary: Gets the first player that matches the query options. Even if there is more than one matching result, only the first will be returned!
member.param: Query options object configured with the query settings.
member.returns: A single Player object, matching the search options, or null, if no matches are found.
member.exception: Thrown when the request is not successful.

member.name: M:PandaScoreNET.PandaScoreLoLProvider.GetPlayers(PandaScoreNET.LoL.PlayerQueryOptions)
member.summary: Queries for a matching array of players.
member.param: Query options object configured with the search settings.
member.returns: An array containing all players that match the search options.
member.exception: Thrown when the request is not successful.

member.name: M:PandaScoreNET.PandaScoreLoLProvider.GetPlayersAsync(PandaScoreNET.LoL.PlayerQueryOptions)
member.summary: Queries for a matching array of players.
member.param: Query options object configured with the search settings.
member.returns: An array containing all players that match the search options.
member.exception: Thrown when the request is not successful.

member.name: M:PandaScoreNET.PandaScoreLoLProvider.GetPlayersLazy(PandaScoreNET.LoL.PlayerQueryOptions,System.Int32)
member.summary: Iterator to get results lazily in a paginated form.
member.param: Query options object configured with the query settings.
How many results should be returned per iteration.
member.returns: Arrays of query results.
